Detailed Description

template<class Config_>
class stxxl::normal_stack< Config_ >

External vector container.

Conservative implementation. Fits best if you access pattern consists of irregulary mixed push'es and pop's. For semantics of the methods see documentation of the STL std::vector.
To gain full bandwidth of disks Config_::BlocksPerPage must >= number of disks

For internal use only.

Construction from a stack.

Parameters:
stack_ stack object (could be external or internal, important is that it must have a copy constructor, top() and pop() methods )
